verbs.description: artie burns on his benching last week pittsburgh steelers [V: cornerback] [ARG0: artie] burns was benched from the defense last sunday against the cleveland browns this was in response to burns being late to a walkthrough last week while he did play special teams he had to stand by and watch his defense put the clamp on the browns en route to a win burns talked about the benching and make no mistake his words might say it was n't a big deal but you can bet it was when asked about artie burns
